snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission has chosen Tracey L. McNeil, an agency veteran and former corporate lawyer, to “act as a liaison in resolving problems that retail investors may have” with the agency.
abstract: The Securities and Exchange Commission has chosen Tracey L. McNeil, an agency veteran and former corporate lawyer, to “act as a liaison in resolving problems that retail investors may have” with the agency.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
